Slag turned to Sludge, and not thinking about safty blasted a stream of 
flame at him.  "You order a flamebroiled sludge burger."

airly2000@... wrote:

> Sludge::
> 
> "flamethrower, flamethrower, flamethrower" said Sludge 'cause he
> liked annoy Slag
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
>  > Slag stared at Hoist. "Flamethrower.  Stupid bot, the name is Slag,
> not
>  > flamethrower."
>  >
>  > rdahl@t... wrote:
>  >
>  > > Hoist strained and got up. "Yes well, you were so busy arguing
> with our
>  > > Flamethrower over there, I didnt think to." he admitted. He
> worked as
>  > > gently as he could, to reconect the dammaged wire.
